alert.note: Alert for Nolan; Runnels; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:00PM CDT until May 07 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Nolan County in west central Texas... Western Taylor County in west central Texas... Northwestern Runnels County in west central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wingate, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Happy Valley around 510 PM CDT. Coronados Camp around 530 PM CDT. View around 545 PM CDT. Caps around 550 PM CDT. Merkel and Dyess Afb around 555 PM CDT. Tye around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Camp Butman and Shep. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 263 and 273. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
